data.name: Barboozeled
data.detailed_description:
What started out as a chance to get out and unwind, ended as a quest to find the door. Navigate your way through the various environments, avoiding not only the tables, chairs, and various furnishings of the local watering hole, but also the patrons and staff. Just be careful not to make too much of a nuisance of yourself, else security will need to take matters into their own hands.

Two dozen unlockable characters, and multiple unlockable levels serve as the basis for the end of the night of overindulgence.

Developer Notes

No epic quest here, just a quick time waster casual game.

Developer Notes

No epic quest here, just a quick time waster casual game.
data.short_description: A simple walking simulation with a twist, make around the obstacles and out the door while not in full control of your own feet.

  • Processor: SSE2
